title.rendered: Keeping Cool During Any Season With Dallas AC Repair

content.rendered:
For homeowners in Dallas, an air conditioner that’s not working right can be the most unbearable thing, especially during summers. If you live in this city that has mild winters and extremely hot summers, AC maintenance should be a part of your annual home maintenance checklist.

Periodic AC maintenance and timely repair will ensure that your air conditioning functions at its peak efficiency at all times. It will save you in terms of energy costs and your AC unit will not require an untimely replacement. If your air conditioner doesn’t seem to be functioning the way it should, get a Dallas AC repair professional as soon as possible.

Why Dallas AC Repair is Pivotal

There are several reasons why you should call a professional to come to your home for AC repair or tune-up. If your AC is blowing warm air; if you notice some rooms are warmer/colder than other areas; or if you notice that the AC unit doesn’t work at a consistent temperature – these are just some of the signs that your AC needs to be inspected and repaired. 

Many homeowners ignore the signs and don’t call a Dallas AC repair service until the unit stops working completely. They don’t realize that it’s much easier and cheaper to fix the AC as soon as they spot the issue. If you keep ignoring or postponing the problem, a simple issue will turn into something bigger, which could even mean that you might have to replace the whole AC unit. 

At United Home Services, our team of licensed and skilled HVAC technicians has a collective experience of over 50 years. This means they know all the possible reasons your air conditioner may not be cooling your home.

We will inspect your AC unit, tell you what’s wrong with it, and then try our best to get it up and running within a couple of hours. Our service vans are always fully equipped so regardless of when you call us, our technicians are always ready to perform any kind of repair. 

Preventative Maintenance is Key

We always advise homeowners to practice some preventative measures so their HVAC system doesn’t need to be repaired in the first place. When you schedule regular AC maintenance with United Home Services, you will receive many perks such as:

  •       Free evaluation
  •       Complete annual checkup
  •       Energy-saving condenser coil cleaning
  •       Checking and adjusting refrigerant levels
  •       Inspecting drains
  •       Discount on AC repair; and much more

Stay Cool All Year With Dallas AC Repair Services

Contact us today at United Home Services if you need quality AC maintenance, repair, or replacement services at the most affordable rates. We have been serving homeowners in Texas for over 20 years, and we can get your broken AC fixed up in no time.

We offer a 100% satisfaction guarantee so you know we stand behind our services wholeheartedly. If you’re not happy with our work or you’re not completely satisfied, just let us know and we will give you your money back!

Call us today at 866-836-2341 or contact us online if you have any questions or you want to schedule a Dallas AC repair.
